name: react-redux-ts-starter-kit
description: starter kit which based on rollup/es6/typescript/react/redux/scss
author: AndreyUtka <AndreyUtka@gmail.com>

scripts.pre-start: npm run clean && npm run notify
scripts.start: BUILD_TYPE='start' npm run pre-start && npm run build:dev && npm run dev:watch
scripts.build: BUILD_TYPE='prod' npm run pre-start && npm run build:prod
scripts.build:pre-build: npm run build:tpl && npm run build:vendor
scripts.build:dev: npm run build:pre-build && npm run build:ts && npm run scss:build && npm run lint
scripts.build:prod: npm run build:pre-build && npm run build:ts-prod && npm run rollup:prod && npm run scss:build
scripts.dev:watch: npm run lint:watch & npm run dev:ts & npm run rollup:dev & npm run scss:dev & npm run server:run & wait
